welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zanzibar, Tanzania! Get ready to immerse yourself in the unique charm of this historic island known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Zanzibar has to offer. Karibu sana! (You're very welcome!)

restaurants.name: Secret Garden
restaurants.description: Secret Garden is a african restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Lukmaan
restaurants.description: Lukmaan is a african restaurant located in Zanzibar.

restaurants.name: Cafe Africa & Shops
restaurants.description: Cafe Africa & Shops is a café located in Zanzibar.

restaurants.name: Ma Shaa Allah
restaurants.description: Ma Shaa Allah is a african restaurant located in Zanzibar.

restaurants.name: Tea House
restaurants.description: Tea House is a persian restaurant located in Stone Town.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kisauni Airport handles both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kisauni Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
